name: Nightmare Fusion
description:
Nightmare Fusion is a short action FPS game where you make your way out of Megaflora City after things become different.

There is one secret level.

Controls:

Left Click to fire.

Right Click to zoom.

Space to jump.

Control to crouch.

Number keys to switch weapons.

E to interact.

M to mute music.
